description: Understanding Social Media Measurement was created to bring awareness to anyone who is utilizing social media for business (or any reason) that his or her online activity is being monitored by social media measurement platforms- and as a result what your online and offline world will be affected as a result because your activity is being looked at. This can affect your chances of getting and missing out on various opportunities- and even clients/customers in the long run. Nothing about making money on Facebook or Twitter is covered. Most of this course is consisted of PPT video modules, an some PDF files.
title: Understanding Social Media Measurement
